article_title: Think Obama's Executive Action on Immigration Was Outrageous? Check Out What He's Doing at the EPA.
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

article_metadata.description: If you think Obama's executive action on immigration was an abuse of power, get a load of what this administration is doing over at the EPA.
